articles.author: India Today News Desk
articles.title: Asian Games 2023 Day 3 Live Updates: India win gold in Equestrian after 3 sailing medals - India Today
articles.description: Asian Games 2023 Day 3 Live: Sudipti Hajela, Divyakriti Singh, Hriday Chheda and Anush Agarwalla have scripted history as India won their first gold medal in the Equestrian Dressage Team Event after 41 years. Earlier, India won three sailing medals on Tuesday…
articles.content:
It's the end of the opening day of the men and women's skeet qualification in individual and team. 
India women's team at the 4th spot with a total of 201 points, 11 points behind table-toppers Chin… [+627 chars]
